entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 12:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
